classifier

Class ReadContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • classifier.ReadContent

  • public class ReadContent
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads content from the given path(Folder or File), and returns a String array This String array will only contain words consisting of [a-zA-Z-], filtering function included Refactor from IO.java
    Version:
    5
    Author:
    zfang6

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadContent(java.lang.String inputPath)
      Instantiates a new read content.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] processDocument()
      Process the path, read the document from given path, if it is a folder, read all the subfiles under it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadContent

        public ReadContent(java.lang.String inputPath)
        Instantiates a new read content. Accept a input file path parameter and a words ArrayList to store the words. Split the document by white spaces, and store the tokens in the word list.
        Parameters:
        inputPath - the input file path

    • Method Detail

      • processDocument

        public java.lang.String[] processDocument()
        Process the path, read the document from given path, if it is a folder, read all the subfiles under it. If it is a file, read its content.
        Returns:
        a String array which contains all the contents of the given file. Only words with a-z, A-Z, "-", "_" will be included.
